summary: I am a highly motivated individual with 5 years of experience in retail across two countries. During my career, I have developed strong organisational and communication skills, as well as a sense of ownership and business acumen. Additionally, I am proficient in English and German, and advanced in Dutch, which allows me to confidently engage with customers and colleagues in a multilingual environment. I am excited to continue growing and contributing my skills and experience to a new professional challenge.
